item.title: Virginia Giuffre, accuser of Epstein and Prince Andrew, dies by suicide: Family
item.description: Jeffrey Epstein, Prince Andrew accuser Virginia Giuffre dies by suicide, family says.

item.title: Pope Francis funeral updates: Services for pontiff set to get underway soon
item.description: Pope Francis, the 266th pope of the Roman Catholic Church, will be buried at the Basilica of Saint Mary Major after dying one week ago at 88 years old...

item.title: More police videos show early days of Gene Hackman investigation
item.description: Authorities in New Mexico have released more videos related to their investigation into the deaths of 95-year-old Gene Hackman and his wife

item.title: WATCH: Drone video captures wildfires at state forest in Pennsylvania
item.description: The fires are burning through Michaux State Forest in Cumberland County.

item.title: Trump claims '200' tariff deals, phone call with China's Xi in wide-ranging interview
item.description: President Trump told Time magazine trade negotiations would be "finished" in 3-4 weeks.
